entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: An Imperial officer with important information about the Empire was able to join the Rebel Alliance thanks to your efforts.
entries.journal_entry_description: Help an Imperial officer defect to the Rebellion by clearing the way for him to get out of Bela Vistal.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Create a diversion in Bela Vistal so that a defecting Imperial officer can get to the shuttleport undetected.
entries.task03_item_name: The communication array has been scrambled
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Interfere with Imperial communication in Bela Vistal by scrambling their three communication arrays.
entries.task04_item_name: The lambda shuttle has been destroyed
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Place explosives on two Imperial Lambda shuttles in Bela Vistal. When those explode, it should attract some attention.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Eliminate the guards at the guard post near the Bela Vistal shuttleport.
